origins.name: Large City
origins.description: You hail from a bustling metropolis, filled with diverse peoples, opportunities, and dangers.

origins.name: Small Village
origins.description: You come from a quiet hamlet where everyone knows everyone, and life moves at a slower pace.

origins.name: Nomadic Tribe
origins.description: Your people wander, following herds, trade routes, or ancient traditions. Home is wherever your tribe makes camp.

origins.name: Mountain Settlement
origins.description: You grew up in the heights, where the air is thin and the peaks touch the sky. Your home was carved from stone.

origins.name: Coastal Town
origins.description: The sea shaped your upbringing. You know the smell of salt air and the rhythm of the tides.

origins.name: Forest Community
origins.description: You lived among the trees, in harmony with nature. The forest provided all you needed.

origins.name: Desert Oasis
origins.description: In the harsh desert, your community clustered around precious water. Survival required cooperation and resilience.

origins.name: Underground City
origins.description: You were raised beneath the earth, in caverns and tunnels. Sunlight was rare, stone and darkness familiar.

origins.name: Island
origins.description: Surrounded by water, your island home was isolated but self-sufficient. The sea was both barrier and highway.

origins.name: Frontier Settlement
origins.description: Your home was on the edge of civilization, where dangers lurked and pioneers carved out new lives.

origins.name: Magical Academy
origins.description: You were raised within the walls of a school of magic, surrounded by arcane knowledge and fellow students.

origins.name: Military Fort
origins.description: Your childhood was spent in a garrison or fortress, where soldiers trained and battles were prepared for.

origins.name: Trading Hub
origins.description: At the crossroads of commerce, your home saw travelers and goods from all over the world.

origins.name: Religious Sanctuary
origins.description: You grew up in a temple, monastery, or holy site dedicated to a deity or spiritual practice.

origins.name: Planar Crossroads
origins.description: Your home existed at a convergence of planes, where reality was thin and the impossible became possible.

origins.name: Ruined City
origins.description: You were born in the remnants of a once-great civilization, living among the echoes of a glorious past.

origins.name: Swamp Settlement
origins.description: The murky wetlands were your home, where life was hard but the land provided for those who knew its secrets.

origins.name: Floating City
origins.description: Your home defied gravity, floating in the sky or hovering over water. The views were spectacular, the falls deadly.
